sect1.title: Introduction

listitem.simpara: issue types and attributes of a module (metadata);
data to update or create issues in a module.

sect1.simpara: In the current development of Scarab it is not possible (yet) to import the metadata, i.e. issue types and attributes.
Access the XML import/export functions using the Administration menu.

sect1.title: XML export of issues
sect1.simpara: Select XML export in the Current module section.

note.para: In the default Role configuration, you just need the Observer role in a module to have access to this functionality.

sect1.title: XML export of metadata (issue types, attributes)
XML import
sect1.simpara: Select XML import in the Current module section.

note.para: In the default Role configuration, you just need the Observer role in a module to have access to this functionality.
